answer.description: Contains the answer or response to the discussion comment.

body.description: Text content of the discussion comment.

forum_id.description: Unique identifier of the forum where the discussion comment belongs.

id.description: Unique identifier for the discussion comment.

published.description: Flag indicating if the comment is published.

spam.description: Flag indicating if the comment is marked as spam.

topic_id.description: Unique identifier of the topic to which the comment is related.

trash.description: Flag indicating if the comment is in the trash.

user_id.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the comment.

created_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the comment was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the comment was last updated.
